content: By the way, when you make new friends in the Galactic Bazaar, {A打招呼}you can <style=Highlight>greet</style> them, just like this! So, shall we head out now?
info: 喜迎新车-艾莎莎尼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Off to the Galactic Bazaar, let's go!
info: 喜迎新车-艾莎莎尼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Alright~! Starsea routes are clear, and comms are stable. {A得意}Let's hit the road, swoosh! Bon voyage—may the stars light your way!
info: 喜迎新车-艾莎莎尼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: On-stage musical battles, super fun markets to browse, {A心虚目移}and magic shows with prize draws too! <style=SizeSmall>I really hope I hit the jackpot...</style>
info: 喜迎新车-艾莎莎尼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A得意}All done! Tee-hee, pretty cool, huh? Let's take your new ride back to your place!
info: 喜迎新车-艾莎莎尼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A期待}Swoosh! Perfect landing. Now, let me give you the grand tour! Welcome to the ever-bustling <style=Highlight>Galactic Bazaar</style>!
